p: We will include cohort and cross-sectional studies with data collected between January 2004 and March 2016 in any country in SSA (Table 1). Studies that examine two or more of the following cascade elements will be included: the number or proportion of persons diagnosed with HIV (first UNAIDS 90-90-90 treatment target), linkage of HIV-positive persons to pre-ART care, retention in pre-ART care, initiating ART, remaining on ART (second UNAIDS 90-90-90 treatment target), and virological suppression among persons on ART (third UNAIDS 90-90-90 treatment target).
